lead_paragraph: Pittsburgh Steelers safety Troy Polamalu told The Herald-Standard of Uniontown, Pa., that he would retire rather than return for a 13th season.

headline.print_headline: Sports Briefing | Pro Football; Polamalu Is Retiring
headline.main: Polamalu Is Said to Be Retiring

snippet: Pittsburgh Steelers safety Troy Polamalu told The Herald-Standard of Uniontown, Pa., that he would retire rather than return for a 13th season.
abstract: Pittsburgh Steelers safety Troy Polamalu will retire at age 33 with two years remaining on his contract; other football news noted.
